text: Aspergillus lucknowensis is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus. It is from the Usti section. The species was first described in 1968.Rai, J.N.; Tewari, J.P.; Agarwal, S.C. 1968. A new species of Aspergillus versicolor groupA. lucknowensis spec. nov., from Indian alkaline soils. Canadian Journal of Botany. 46(12):1483-1484 == References == lucknowensis Category:Fungi described in 1968
title: Aspergillus lucknowensis
